name: Puntalo
tag_list: gps, location, mobile-tracking, family-security, child, tracking, android, iphone, ipad, symbian
overview:
Track your loved ones & find your lost or stolen phone or tablet

If you always misplace or lose your phone, you may already wonder how to get it back when you lose it again. Puntalo is a cool app that makes it easy for you to find your lost or stolen phone by tracking its whereabouts. In addition, Puntalo also lets you track your family or the people you care by sending you SMS or e-mail notifications whenever they leave or arrive at a certain location.

This German startup lets you look position of your phones on a map, and receive notifications both by email and by SMS whenever they are not when they are supposed to be. The service is compatible with Symbian, Android and iOS devices and allows you to manage many phones from a single account making protect your mobile life easy.

This is accomplished by installing a small application on the mobile to be tracked. Such a process is a simple one, and once it has been dealt with you will be allowed to see where your family and those you care about are located at all times of day.

For its part, email and SMS notifications are set down by drawing an area on the map denoting the safety area for the one carrying the phone. Whenever he moves out of that area, a notification will be immediately sent to you.

It is important to make it clear that Puntalo is not a spy application. The person whose mobile is being tracked knows all about it - he can always see a telltale sign when Puntalo is running on his mobile, and he can also see the name and email of the person who is tracking his phone.
